subject: openpower-extension: Adding opdreport script
commitMessage:
openpower-extension: Adding opdreport script

opdreport script is added to handle openpower dumps like
hostboot, HW dump etc. It will basically compress the files
add header on top of it.
Currently, only hostboot dump is supported.

Changes:
- opdreport will tar the dump files, add header on top of it,
gzip the file and move it to requested path.
- In gendumpheader script adding the elements required for
hostboot dump header.

Note: Changes are related to IBM specific systems only
If user wants to extract the dump, they have to unzip the file
using gunzip, remove the header added by dd command.
Example
dd bs=1232 skip=1 if=<input_dump_file> of=<output_file>

Test:
Using openpower-dump script, able to create dump
Format:
<Dump name>_<Dump ID>_<TIME>.tar.gz

Header is applied post 1st compression, it consists of:
File header, Section headers and platform dump header.
Elements added comprises of dump file type, dump_id,
time stamp, size, system related information like model number,
serial number, hostname etc.

Signed-off-by: Chirag Sharma <chirshar@in.ibm.com>
Change-Id: Ica510d991142aaf10ccbfa22fc9f1deb3743453c
